explanation: The stage direction starts with 'AIR', which is a common indicator that it refers to music. The content following 'AIR' is the name of the tune, in this case, 'Ah ! le charmant Berger que j'aime'. This fits well with the definition of Category 8: music description.
stgdir: AIR. Ah ! le charmant Berger que j'aime.
